word:
EGW: I do not think it is safe. I tell you we are in a world of temptation, and you get men and women dealing over subjects like these, and it is feeding evil ideas. I think it would be safe to separate them. I think the women have much more intelligence than they put into exercise.-- Manuscript 2, 1911. 

White Estate Washington, D. C. September, 1983 

Entire Manuscript Released
